titles.title: PAID OFF Act of 2025
PAID OFF Act of 2025
Preventing Adversary Influence, Disinformation, and Obscured Foreign Financing Act of 2025
To amend the Foreign Agents Registration Act of 1938, as amended, to modify requirements under that Act relating to exemptions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, and Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
